actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United Stated Code to increase the availability of the class action mechanism in Federal cases by permitting the creation of manageable subclasses.

summary.text: Provides that in any Federal class action case the trial court may make any order respecting the size of the class or the creation of a subclass as it determines is necessary to render such class action more manageable and is compatible with the interests of justice.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United Stated Code to increase the availability of the class action mechanism in Federal cases by permitting the creation of manageable subclasses.
